title: Fix command timeout - switch to claude --print mode
description: Interactive Claude mode doesn't output to stdout pipes. Need to switch to --print mode for programmatic communication.
close_reason: Fixed by switching to claude --print mode. Refactored ClaudeProcess to spawn ephemeral processes instead of maintaining long-running interactive sessions.

title: Phase 10: Testing - Comprehensive manual testing
description: Test all workflows: session creation, command execution, response actions, multiple sessions, crash recovery, edge cases, error handling, performance. Verify all success criteria met.
close_reason: Phase 10 completed: Comprehensive testing guide created

title: Implement simplified inline editing (feature 004)
description: Replace modal workflow with floating inline prompt, single default session, ad-claude-error for errors
close_reason: Implemented: inline prompt UI, single default session, ad-claude-error format, removed old modals

title: Claude tries to write files instead of returning text response
Add session cleanup features
description: Add ability to automatically and manually clean up stopped/stale sessions from the session list. Includes: auto-remove stopped external sessions on startup, 'Clear stopped sessions' button, and optional session age limit in settings.

title: Phase 4: Session Management - Implement session tracking
description: Implement SessionManager class in src/session-manager.ts. Handle session CRUD operations, persistence to sessions.json, session detection on startup, and state management (active/stopped/crashed).
close_reason: Phase 4 completed: SessionManager implemented with CRUD, persistence, and detection

title: Phase 6: UI Command & Response - Create command/response modals
description: Implement CommandInputModal in src/command-input-modal.ts and ResponseModal in src/response-modal.ts. Handle command input, loading states, response display, and action buttons (copy/insert/replace).
close_reason: Phase 6 completed: Command and Response modals implemented

title: Phase 9: Documentation - Write user and developer docs
description: Write README.md with installation, usage guide, requirements, troubleshooting. Add JSDoc comments to code. Create example workflows.
close_reason: Phase 9 completed: Comprehensive README documentation written

title: Implement Named Pipe Bridge for connecting to existing Claude shells
description: Create a bridge system using named pipes (FIFOs) that allows the plugin to communicate with user-started Claude shells. User will see commands and responses in their terminal.
close_reason: Bridge implementation complete. Users can now start Claude via claude-bridge.sh and send commands from Obsidian. Includes comprehensive logging, documentation (BRIDGE.md), and support for multiple concurrent bridge sessions.

title: Phase 1: Project Setup - Bootstrap project with configuration files
description: Create package.json, tsconfig.json, esbuild.config.mjs, manifest.json, .gitignore, src/ directory structure. Install dependencies and verify build works.
close_reason: Phase 1 completed: All config files created, src/ structure setup, dependencies installed, build verified

title: Fix response separator visibility
description: Changed from <!-- Claude --> to admonition format (ad-claude)

title: Implement skills feature (003)
close_reason: Implemented: SkillManager loads skills from vault, integrated with InlinePrompt, PR #1 created

title: Fix tag format breaking markdown rendering
description: Changed from <CLAUDE> tags to === CLAUDE PROCESSING === format

title: Phase 7: Plugin Integration - Wire up complete workflow
description: Implement ClaudeFromObsidianPlugin class in src/main.ts. Register commands, implement complete workflow (select → session → command → response), handle errors, plugin lifecycle management.
close_reason: Phase 7 completed: Main plugin class with complete workflow integration

title: Phase 8: Polish & Error Handling - Add robustness and UX
description: Add comprehensive error messages, crash recovery, loading indicators, command history, session management command, styling improvements, and settings page.
close_reason: Phase 8 completed: Settings tab and session management added

title: Phase 3: Process Management - Implement Claude process spawning
description: Implement ClaudeProcess and ClaudeProcessManager classes in src/process-manager.ts. Handle process lifecycle, stdin/stdout communication, command-response protocol, timeouts, and crash detection.
close_reason: Phase 3 completed: Process management implemented with ClaudeProcess and ClaudeProcessManager classes

title: Phase 2: Type Definitions - Define TypeScript interfaces
description: Implement src/types.ts with SessionMetadata, ClaudeProcessOptions, settings interfaces. Implement src/utils.ts with generateSessionId, checkPidExists, resolveWorkingDirectory.
close_reason: Phase 2 completed: Type definitions and utilities implemented, TypeScript compilation verified

title: Implement parallel Claude execution (feature 001)
description: Implement non-blocking Claude execution with tag injection, status bar, and request queue

title: Phase 5: UI Session Selection - Create session selector modals
description: Implement SessionSelectorModal and NewSessionModal in src/session-selector-modal.ts. Display session list with status badges, handle session creation, directory validation.
close_reason: Phase 5 completed: Session selector modals and styles implemented
